name: SPIRIT:
text: There should be a key around here.

name: SPIRIT:
text: These places and their regalia don’t belong in the mountain.

name: SPIRIT:
text: It was your kind who placed those here.

name: SPIRIT:
text: A dirty vase, in a sacred place . . .

name: SPIRIT:
text: Only a fool ignorant of their surroundings would make such a thing.

name: SPIRIT:
text: Humans sheltered here, i know not why nor when.

name: SPIRIT:
text: Whatever that “pestilence” mentioned on that log, sure did manage to torment them.

name: SPIRIT:
text: I was dormant for uncountable years, you are the first I’ve seen since then.

name: SPIRIT:
text: I hope you are not the last . . .
